newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: ASX substantial shareholding notices - Aug 19.
newsitem.headline: ASX substantial shareholding notices - Aug 19.

text.p: The following substantial shareholder notices were made to The Australian Stock Exchange (ASX) yesterday.
New Zealand Petroleum Company increased its relevant interest in Frontier Petroleum NL on 11/08/1997, from 7,161,369 ordinary shares (10.48%) to 8,418,369 ordinary shares (12.31%).
Zennyar Pty Ltd changed its relevant interest in Citie Centre Limited on 31/07/1997, from 8,205,789 ordinary shares (78.15%) to 8,206,067 ordinary shares (78.15%).

Octavo Services Ltd became a substantial shareholder in Formulab Neuronetics Corporation Limited on 13/08/1997 with a relevant interest in the issued ordinary share capital of 150,541,522 ordinary shares (50.49%).
Waverley Mining Finance plc decreased its relevant interest in Monto Minerals NL on 06/08/1997, from 4,416,063 ordinary shares (12.03%) to 3,416,063 ordinary shares (9.31%).
N M Rothschild & Sons (Australia) Pty Ltd ceased to be a substantial shareholder in Hawker Richardson Limited on 15/08/1997.
Major Drilling Australia Pty Ltd increased its relevant interest in Mining World Limited on 15/08/1997, from 16,296,610 ordinary shares (92.89%) to 16,301,763 ordinary shares (92.93%).
AXA-UAP increased its relevant interest in Computer Power Group Limited on 15/08/1997, from 3,288,265 ordinary shares (9.75%) to 3,643,265 ordinary shares (10.79%).

N M Rothschild & Sons (Australia) Pty Ltd increased its relevant interest in Southern Cross Broadcasting (Australia) Limited on 31/07/1997, from 1,651,731 ordinary shares (6.52%) to 2,297,071 ordinary shares (8.5%).
Permanent Trustee Company Ltd increased its relevant interest in Environmental Recovery Services Limited on 22/07/1997, from 2,915,815 ordinary shares (12.79%) to 3,434,949 ordinary shares (15.07%).

N M Rothschild & Sons (Australia) Pty Ltd decreased its relevant interest in National Industrial Property Trust on 06/08/1997, from 34,052,693 ordinary shares (17.79%) to 33,083,693 ordinary shares (16.13%).
Permanent Trustee Company Ltd increased its relevant interest in Pacific Hydro Limited on 18/08/1997, from 5,067,000 ordinary shares (12.43%) to 5,544,665 ordinary shares (13.51%).
Simeon Wines Limited increased its relevant interest in Australian Vintage Limited on 18/08/1997, from 30,966,198 ordinary shares (83.90%) to 33,312,410 ordinary shares (90.26%).
Bankers Trust Australia Ltd increased its relevant interest in Adsteam Marine Limited on 13/08/1997, from 9,136,302 ordinary shares (11.42%) to 10,192,755 ordinary shares (12.74%).
Permanent Trustee Company Ltd decreased its relevant interest in Hills Motorway Group on 18/08/1997, from 31,016,807 ordinary shares (18.80%) to 29,085,910 ordinary shares (17.63%).
Perpetual Trustees Australia Ltd increased its relevant interest in Coates Hire Limited on 28/07/1997, from 3,436,508 ordinary shares (5.05%) to 4,159,537 ordinary shares (6.05%).
Deutsche Australia Ltd increased its relevant interest in Ausdoc Group Limited on 13/08/1997, from 3,624,785 ordinary shares (6.35%) to 4,070,126 ordinary shares (7.47%).

Permanent Trustee Company Ltd increased its relevant interest in Infrastructure Trust Of Australia Group on 18/08/1997, from 52,945,279 ordinary shares (15.97%) to 56,612,391 ordinary shares (17.06%).
Pacarc NL decreased its relevant interest in Pacrim Energy NL on 18/08/1997, from 11,686,000 voting shares (34.88%) to 11,936,000 voting shares (20.44%).

Saracen Mineral Holdings Limited became a substantial shareholder in Uranium Austalia NL on 25/07/1997 with a relevant interest in the issued ordinary share capital of 14,281,184 ordinary shares (13.97%).
Australian Mutual Provident Society ceased to be a substantial shareholder in Holyman Limited on 14/08/1997.
Mercury Asset Management Group ceased to be a substantial shareholder in Queensland Metals Corp Limited on 14/08/1997.
Permanent Trustee Company Limited decreased its relevant interest in OPSM Protector Limited on 18/08/1997, from 14,388,834 ordinary shares (10.16%) to 12,904,226 ordinary shares (9.0%).
Ramsay Health Care Limited ceased to be a substantial shareholder in Prime Television Limited on 13/06/1997.
Presprone Pty Ltd ceased to be a substantial shareholder in Prime Television Limited on 13/06/1997.
